text: @jessphillips Could of been mild symptoms of COVID-19 but I’m no expert on the matter.   The important thing is you are healthy and well now and hopefully there will be an antibody test soon to confirm if people have had it or not.  I’d assume for now you haven’t & act accordingly to be safe
